The original value at the passed index will be replaced with the passed value * * @param {List} $list The list to process * @param {Number} $index The index to set the value in the list * @param {Mixed} $value The value to set in the list * @return {List} The new processed list * * @example scss * Sugar.list-set-nth(('hello','world'), 1, 'coco'); // => ('coco','world') * * @since 1.0.0 * @author Olivier Bossel (https://olivierbossel.com) */ /** * @name list-nth * @namespace sugar.scss.core.list.function * @type function * * Return the item of the list at the passed index * * @param {List} $list The list to process * @param {Number} $index The index of the element to get in the list * @return {Mixed} The value at the passed index * * @example scss * Sugar.list-nth(('hello','world'), 2); // => 'world' * * @since 1.0.0 * @author Olivier Bossel (https://olivierbossel.com) */ /** * @name list-pop * @namespace sugar.scss.core.list.function * @type function * * Remove the last item of the passed list * * @param {List} $list The list to process * @return {List} The processed list * * @example scss * Sugar.list-pop(('hello', 'world')); // ('hello') * * @since 1.0.0 * @author Olivier Bossel (https://olivierbossel.com) */ /** * @name list-prepend * @namespace sugar.scss.core.list.function * @type function * * Prepend a value in the passed list * * @param {List} $list The list to process * @param {Mixed} $value The value to prepend in the list * @param {String} [$separator=auto] The separator to use. Can be auto, space or comma * @return {List} The new list with his new value * * @example scss * Sugar.list-prepend(('hello','world'), 'coco'); // => ('coco','hello','world') * * @since 1.0.0 * @author Olivier Bossel (https://olivierbossel.com) */ /** * @name list-remove-nth * @namespace sugar.scss.core.list.function * @type function * * Remove item from list using an index * * @param {List} $list The list to process * @param {Number} $index The index of the item to remove from the list * @return {List} The processes list * * @example scss * Sugar.list-remove-nth(('hello','world'), 1); // ('hello') * * @since 1.0.0 * @author Olivier Bossel (https://olivierbossel.com) */ /** * @name list-search * @namespace sugar.scss.core.list.function * @type function * * Search for the passed value in the passed list and return true if exist, false if not * * @param {List} $list The list in which to search for the passed value * @param {Mixed} $value The value to search in the List * @return {Boolean} true if the value exist in the list, false if not * * @example scss * Sugar.list-search(('hello', 'world'), 'hello'); // => true * * @since 1.0.0 * @author Olivier Bossel (https://olivierbossel.com) */ /** * @name dash-to-map * @namespace sugar.scss.core.map.function * @type function * * Transform a dash notation value into a map * Dash notation value is : -key1 value1 -key2 value2 * * @param {List} $dash The dash list notation to transform * @return {Map} The map generated * * @example * $dash : -hello world -coco universe * Sugar.dash-to-map($dash); * // ( * // hello : world, * // coco : universe * // ) * * @since 1.0.0 * @author Olivier Bossel (https://olivierbossel.com) */ /** * @name map-deep-values * @namespace sugar.scss.core.map.function * @type function * * Get values of a map even if it is deep * * @param {Map} $map The map to get values from * @return {List} The list of map values * * @example scss * Sugar.map-deep-values(( * 'hello': 'world', * 'coco': ( * 'plop': 'youhou' * ) * )); * // => ('world', 'youhou') * * @since 1.0.0 * @author Olivier Bossel (https://olivierbossel.com) */ /** * @name map-extend * @namespace sugar.scss.core.map.function * @type function * * Extend the passed map with the others passed map(s) * * @param {Map} $map The map to @extend * @param {Map|List-Map} $maps The map(s) used to extend the first one * @return {Map} The extended map * * @example scss * Sugar.map-extend(( * 'hello': 'world' * ), ( * 'coco': 'plop' * )); * // returned map: * ( * 'hello': 'world', * 'coco': 'plop' * ) * * @since 1.0.0 * @author Olivier Bossel (https://olivierbossel.com) */ /** * @name map-filter * @namespace sugar.scss.core.map.function * @type function * * Filter a map by key, value and the passed processor function * * @param {Map} $map The map to process * @param {String} $processor The processor function name you want to invoke on each values * @return {Map} The filtered map * * @example scss * @function my-cool-function($key, value) { * @return true; * } * Sugar.map-filter(( * 'hello.world': 'Hello', * 'coco.world': 'Coco', * 'hello.that': 'That is cool' * ), 'my-cool-function'); * // return that map: * ( * 'hello.world': 'Hello', * 'coco.world': 'Coco', * 'hello.that': 'That is cool' * ) * * @since 2.0.0 * @author Olivier Bossel (https://olivierbossel.com) */ /** * @name map-filter-by-namespace * @namespace sugar.scss.core.map.function * @type function * * Return all the map values that have a key that match the passed namespace * * @param {Map} $map The map to process * @param {String} $namespace The namespace to search like (something.another.thing) * @return {Map} The filtered map * * @example scss * Sugar.map-filter-by-namespace(( * 'hello.world': 'Hello', * 'coco.world': 'Coco', * 'hello.that': 'That is cool' * ), 'hello'); * // return that map: * ( * 'hello.world': 'Hello', * 'hello.that': 'That is cool' * ) * * @since 1.0.0 * @author Olivier Bossel (https://olivierbossel.com) */ /** * @name map-to-css-variables * @namespace sugar.scss.core.map.function * @type Mixin * * THis mixin simply take a single level map and convert it to * css variables declarations like ```--my-cool-variable: 10px``` * * @param {Map} $map The map to convert to css variables declarations * * @example scss * $map: ( * something-cool: 10px * ); * @include Sugar.map-to-css-variables($map); * * @since 2.0.0 * @author Olivier Bossel (https://olivierbossel.com) */ /** * @name map-flatten * @namespace sugar.scss.core.map.function * @type Function * * This function take a map (that can be a deep one) and returns you a new map with all the * properties flatten using the passed "separator" * * @param {Map} $map The map to flatten * @param {String} [$separator="-"] The separator to use in final map keys * @return {Map}  The flattened map * * @example scss * $map: ( * something: ( * cool: 'Hello world' * ) * ) * map-flatten($map); // => 'world' * * @since 1.0.0 * @author Olivier Bossel (https://olivierbossel.com) */ /** * @name map-has-key * @namespace sugar.scss.core.map.function * @type function * * Check if the passed map has the passed key. Return true if has, false if not * * @param {Map} $map The map to check * @param {String} $key The key to check in the map * @return {Boolean} true if has the key, false if not * * @example scss * Sugar.map-has-key(( * 'hello': 'world', * 'coco': 'plop' * ), 'hello'); // => true * * @since 1.0.0 * @author Olivier Bossel (https://olivierbossel.com) */ /** * @name map-keys * @namespace sugar.scss.core.map.function * @type function * * Return a comma separated list of the map keys * * @param {Map} $map The map to process * @return {List} The list of map keys * * @example scss * Sugar.map-keys(( * 'hello': 'world', * 'coco': 'plop' * )); // => ('hello','coco') * * @since 1.0.0 * @author Olivier Bossel (https://olivierbossel.com) */ /** * @name map-merge * @namespace sugar.scss.core.map.function * @type function * * Merge the first passed map with the second passed one and return the result * * @param {Map} $map1 The first map to extend * @param {Map} $map2 The second map to extend the first one with * @return {Map} The extended map * * @example scss * Sugar.map-merge(( * hello: 'world' * ), ( * coco: 'plop' * )); * // returned map: * ( * hello: 'world', * coco: 'plop' * ) * * @since 1.0.0 * @author Olivier Bossel (https://olivierbossel.com) */ /** * @name map-remove * @namespace sugar.scss.core.map.function * @type function * * Remove one or multiple keys from the passed map * * @param {Map} $map The map to process * @param {String} $keys...
